name: Times Turn (Dylan Growcoot, Alex Gottini)
description:
Time is elusive, hard to grasp, ever-lasting... But its purpose is clear: Change. 
Push and swing time itself through epic worlds in this colourful 2D physics platformer!

Times Turn puts you in charge of a physical manifestation of Time, running through the entire age of the universe to experience everything.

Enjoy the tranquil vector art style in 15 levels, divided into 3 difficulty tiers, with fully voiced characters that tell you a bit about the world of Time.  Warning; the hard levels are a real challenge! This movement system is easy to pick up, but can take a lot of effort to master, and we offer you a brutal test in the final levels! Alternatively, compete for the fastest times!

To play the game, simply download, unzip, and run "TimesTurn.exe". We recommend using a controller if you have access to it.  If you come across any bugs, let us know in the comments.

If you enjoy the game (or hate it to the point you want more), leave a rating and tell your friends! And if you want to hang out with us, come join our discord server and say hi!
https://discord.gg/2MANK5jE7h

Have Fun!
